questions.question_text: Rajah 1 menunjukkan satu spektrum gelombang elektromagnet. Diagram 1 shows an electromagnetic wave spectrum. The image contains a physics diagram showing an experiment setup for studying the relationship between current and force.

sub_questions.question_text: Tandakan (✔) untuk jawapan yang betul dalam kotak yang disediakan. Tick (✔) for the correct answer in the box provided. Jenis spektrum yang ditunjukkan dalam Rajah 1 adalah The type of spectrum shown in Diagram 1 is
State how the spectrum in 1(a) is produced.
Based on Quantum Physics Theory, light energy exists in the form of photon. What is the meaning of photon? What happens to the photon energy if the frequency of the light wave decreased?

questions.question_text: Rajah 2.1 menunjukkan pembiasan gelombang air apabila mendekati pantai. Diagram 2.1 shows the refraction of water waves when approaching the beach. On Diagram 2.2, (i) complete the direction of propagation of water wave in the shallow sea. (ii) draw the wavefronts of the water waves in the shallow sea. Rajah 2.2 menunjukkan perambatan gelombang air dari kawasan laut dalam. Diagram 2.2 shows the propagation of water wave from the deep sea region.

sub_questions.question_text: Apakah maksud pembiasan gelombang? What is the meaning of refraction of waves?
Rajah 2.2 menunjukkan perambatan gelombang air dari kawasan laut dalam. Diagram 2.2 shows the propagation of water wave from the deep sea region.
The speed of water waves in shallow sea and deep sea are 4.0 m s⁻¹ and 9.0 m s⁻¹ respectively. The wavelength in the deep sea is 5.0 m. Calculate the wavelength in the shallow sea.

questions.question_text: Diagram 3.1 shows 0.6 kg of ice is heated using a 1000 W immersion heater. Specific latent heat of fusion of ice is 334 000 J kg⁻¹. Diagram 3.2 shows a graph of mass of ice, m, change with time, t during heating. The image contains a physics diagram showing an experiment setup for studying the relationship between current and force.

sub_questions.question_text: Apakah yang dimaksudkan dengan haba pendam tentu pelakuran? What is the meaning of specific latent heat of fusion?

Berdasarkan Rajah 3.2, Based on Diagram 3.2, hitungkan kuantiti haba yang diserap oleh ais ketika peleburan. Andaikan tiada haba terbebas ke persekitaran. calculate the quantity of heat absorbed by the ice during melting. Assume no heat released to the surrounding. tentukan nilai X. determine the value of X.

questions.question_text: Diagram 4.1 shows the position of the Sun, Earth and Moon. Diagram 4.2 shows a rocket at a launch site. Question 4: Explain the relationship between current and force acting on a conductor. The image contains a physics diagram showing an experiment setup for studying the relationship between current and force. Image Description: The image contains a physics diagram showing an experiment setup for studying the relationship between current and force.

sub_questions.question_text: State the Newton's Universal Law of Gravitation. Name the rule used to determine the direction of force acted on the conductor.

Calculate the gravitational force between the Earth and the Sun. Observe Diagram 5.1 and Diagram 5.2. Compare the ammeter reading. Compare the distance travelled by the copper rod. Compare the magnetic field strength of the permanent magnet.

The rocket at the launch site experiences gravitational force of 5.0 × 10⁵ N. Calculate the mass of the rocket. Based on your answer in 5(b), state the relationship between the magnitude of current and the distance travelled by the copper rod.

Describe an experiment to study the relationship between the current and the force acting on a conductor when the switch is closed. Use diagrams 5.1 and 5.2 to illustrate your answer. Hence, deduce the relationship between the magnitude of the current and the magnetic force produced. According to Newton's Universal Law of Gravitation, two persons on the surface of the Earth experience the gravitational force. Explain why the effect of the force is not felt?
What will happen to the distance travelled by the copper rod if a stronger magnet is used?
Diagram 5.3 shows a simple structure of a direct current motor.

questions.question_text: Rajah 6.1(a) dan Rajah 6.1(b) menunjukkan sebuah troli yang bergerak menuruni satah condong dengan ketinggian, h yang berbeza. Diagram 6.1(a) and Diagram 6.1(b) show a trolley moves down on inclined plane with different height, h. Based on Diagram 6.1(a) and Diagram 6.1(b), compare the height of the inclined plane. Based on Diagram 6.1(a) and Diagram 6.1(b), compare the velocity of the trolley at P. Based on Diagram 6.1(a) and Diagram 6.1(b), compare the momentum of the trolley at P. Based on the ticker tape, calculate velocity of the trolley. Based on the ticker tape, calculate momentum of the trolley.

sub_questions.question_text: Apakah yang dimaksudkan dengan momentum? What is the meaning of momentum?
the height of the inclined plane.
the velocity of the trolley at P.
the momentum of the trolley at P.
Relate the height of inclined plane and the velocity of the trolley at P.
State the relationship between the velocity of the trolley and its momentum.
velocity of the trolley
momentum of the trolley

questions.question_text: Diagram 7.1 shows an electron beam that is accelerated from the cathode to the anode in a vacuum space. The potential difference across the electrodes is 500 V.  State the type of motion of the electron beam which moves across the electrodes in the vacuum space. Image Description: The image contains a physics diagram showing an experiment setup for studying the relationship between current and force. Based on Table 1, state the suitable characteristics of a heating filament. Give a reason. Based on your answer in 7(c)(i) and 7(c)(ii), determine the most suitable heating filament. Rajah 7.2 menunjukkan penghasilan sinar katod dalam sebuah tiub vakum. Diagram 7.2 shows the production of cathode rays in a vacuum tube.

sub_questions.question_text: State the type of motion of the electron beam which moves across the electrodes in the vacuum space.

Hitung halaju maksimum elektron merentasi katod dan anod. Calculate the maximum velocity of the electron across cathode and anode. [Jisim elektron, m = 9.11 x 10-31 kg, cas satu elektron, e = 1.6 x 10-19 C] [Mass of an electron, m = 9.11 x 10-31 kg, charge of an electron, e = 1.6 x 10-19 C]
Rajah 7.2 menunjukkan penghasilan sinar katod dalam sebuah tiub vakum. Diagram 7.2 shows the production of cathode rays in a vacuum tube. Type of material. Reason
Type of material

Type of connecting wire. Reason
Cross section area. Reason

questions.question_text: Diagram 9.1 shows a simple structure of a hydraulic system. You are required to investigate the characteristics of a hydraulic bridge as shown in Table 2. Diagram 10.2 shows a transmission tower being used for transmission of electromagnetic waves in telecommunication. Table 3 shows the specifications of four transmitting systems, S, T, U and V, that can be used for transmitting electromagnetic waves in telecommunication. What are the specifications of the four transmitting systems? Study and determine the most suitable transmitting systems to improve the quality of transmission of signal. Rajah 10.2 menunjukkan menara pemancar yang digunakan dalam pemancaran gelombang elektromagnet untuk tujuan telekomunikasi. Diagram 10.2 shows a transmission tower being used for transmission of electromagnetic waves in telecommunication. Jadual 3 menunjukkan spesifikasi bagi empat sistem pemancaran S, T, U dan V yang boleh digunakan untuk memancarkan gelombang elektromagnet dalam telekomunikasi. Table 3 shows the specifications of four transmitting systems, S, T, U and V, that can be used for transmitting electromagnetic waves in telecommunication.

sub_questions.question_text: State the principle applied to the hydraulic system.
Explain the working principle of the hydraulic system.

Rajah 10.2 menunjukkan menara pemancar yang digunakan dalam pemancaran gelombang elektromagnet untuk tujuan telekomunikasi. Diagram 10.2 shows a transmission tower being used for transmission of electromagnetic waves in telecommunication. Jadual 3 menunjukkan spesifikasi bagi empat sistem pemancaran S, T, U dan V yang boleh digunakan untuk memancarkan gelombang elektromagnet dalam telekomunikasi. Table 3 shows the specifications of four transmitting systems, S, T, U and V, that can be used for transmitting electromagnetic waves in telecommunication.
Explain the suitability for each specification.
Choose the most suitable system. Give reason for your choice.

questions.question_text: Rajah 11.1 menunjukkan seorang budak bermain kuda berspring. Diagram 11.1 shows a boy playing a horse spring. By using Diagram 11.3(a) and Diagram 11.3(b), compare the initial length of spring, thickness of spring and compression of spring. Relate the thickness of spring and the compression of spring to make a deduction regarding the relationship between the thickness of spring and the spring constant. Using appropriate physics concepts, suggest the use of materials and appropriate design of sofa that can accommodate a person with a larger mass and more comfortable. Your proposal must include the characteristics of the spring and the additional features. Rajah 11.2(a) menunjukkan panjang asal spring itu sebelum satu beban diletakkan di atasnya. Rajah 11.2(b) menunjukkan spring yang sama selepas beban itu dialihkan. Diagram 11.2(a) shows the original length of a spring before a load is placed on it. Diagram 11.2(b) shows the same spring after the load is removed.

sub_questions.question_text: Nyatakan hukum Hooke. State Hooke's law.

Rajah 11.2(a) menunjukkan panjang asal spring itu sebelum satu beban diletakkan di atasnya. Rajah 11.2(b) menunjukkan spring yang sama selepas beban itu dialihkan. Diagram 11.2(a) shows the original length of a spring before a load is placed on it. Diagram 11.2(b) shows the same spring after the load is removed.
